title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Ken Matthews guest hosts for Rush on Monday. You are not alone in being concerned about the direction of the Democrat Party. Lenin statue in Seattle still stands as Founder statues torn down. The hypocrisy of tearing down Ulysses S. Grant’s statue. Brett Favre says Colin Kaepernick is a hero like Pat Tillman. Caller: Trump rally was unbelievable. Leftist threats are to keep away first-time Trump supporters. Where are the conservative voices (other than on the EIB Network)? Over Father’s Day weekend, over 100 people were shot and 14 killed in Chicago. Miley Cyrus and The Rock to put on coronavirus concert.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Key West continues mask orders until June 2021. COVID spike due to testing. Media exaggerates Trump testing joke. Hypocritical Democrats cherry pick the Constitution. The version of the news that is designed to persuade you, not inform you. Amy Klobuchar didn’t want to be vetted for VP. “Uncle Tom” movie should be watched by everyone. John Oliver, Late Night Moron. Propaganda pipeline: almost 100% of Democrat college students support defunding police. Leaving out Democrat responsibility from the public narrative. The Bill of Rights is the true equalizer.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Getting the real, boots-on-the-ground news for the Tulsa Rally. The wheels are coming off the left. News media is not allowing the truth to be heard. COVID scare makes Americans not see their doctors. Sarasota Police will no longer wear thin blue line logo on uniforms. Time to finish the wall. China doesn’t care about people, why would they care about dogs? Time to let Massachusetts go bankrupt. Leftist thugs reminiscent of Soviet and Nazi control. It’s too easy to manipulate low data polls. Tom Petty family upset with Trump using “I Won’t Back Down.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
